casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Randolph A. SCOTT. No. D-2999. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

Randolph A. Scott, of Warrington, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of *310law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
